nodes.bodyText:
Sorry that I didn't catch this earlier.
Are we shipping a copy of the license to our users already? Usually, dependencies with other licenses are shipped like this: https://github.com/apache/flink/tree/master/flink-connectors/flink-connector-kinesis/src/main/resources/META-INF/licenses
